channel.title: Server status help
channel.description: is there anyway to put a server check (simple one) that only checks my server that i can put in my forums like in the headers???

item.title: Server status help
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[code]<?php
$ip = “IP here”;
$port= “Port here”;

if (!$sock = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $num, $error, 5))
{
echo ‘Offline’;
} else {
echo ‘Online’;
}
?>[/code]

Should do fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status help
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Goodoo dolls, post:1, topic:193133”]is there anyway to put a server check (simple one) that only checks my server that i can put in my forums like in the headers???[/quote]If you can read:
Look at what all the other server status pages use to check servers…
Then just take that and use it?

It’s simple.

Read full topic
